portfolio.title: iOS Apps
portfolio.description: This portfolio features all of the iOS apps that I have developed. It includes a variety of apps that I have developed as requirements for the iOS Development Nanodegree of Udacity.com, and some that I have developed and published on the App Store on my own.

portfolio.title: Website Development
portfolio.description: MemeMe is a project requirement to earn an iOS Development Nanodegree from Udacity.com. MemeMe allows you to take or choose a photo and create a meme with it. You have can choose from three pre selected fonts and afterwards you can share or simply save you meme. It was written completely in Swift.

portfolio.title: Python Modules
portfolio.description: PitchPerfect is a project requirement to earn an iOS Development Nanodegree from Udacity.com. PitchPerfect is a simple iOS App that allows you to record your voice and play it back with different effects like slow, fast, low pitch, high pitch, echo, and reverb. It was written completely in Swift.
